/circle6 Maternal deaths are rare events at the village or SC level and therefore the community 
may not register their importance. Y ou, as the ANM and the health worker visiting the 
area should build a rapport with SHGs and Panchayati Raj Institution (PRI) members to 
undertake a social review of the maternal deaths reported from the villages under your 
care. Th is ‘review’ focuses on fi  nding the social factors responsible for maternal deaths.
